response:
"warum gibt es immer noch firmen, die unser persönliche daten ohne unsere zustimmung sammeln und verwenden? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #respektunsererechte"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect our personal data without our consent? #dataprotection #privacy #respectourrights"

this post critically examines the issue of companies collecting personal data without consent, which is a violation of data privacy and privacy rights. the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #respektunsererechte (respect our rights) are used to reach a wider audience and to emphasize the importance of protecting personal information.
